firstly, in a sauce pan take 2 cup milk.

 add 1/4 cup cocoa powder, 2 tbsp sugar and 2 tbsp cream.

 whisk continuously making sure the cocoa powder is well combined.

 continue to whisk and get the milk to boil.

 turn off the flame and add 1 tsp vanilla extract. mix well.

 prepare whipping cream by taking 1 cup chilled whipping cream.

 also add 2 tbsp powdered sugar and 1 tsp vanilla extract.

 beat on low speed until the cream thickens.

 after 5 minutes, the cream turns stiff peaks.

 pour the hot chocolate into glass and a dollop of whipped cream.

 finally, enjoy hot chocolate sprinkled with more cocoa powder.
